channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: India, EU reach ‘mother of all’ trade agreements after nearly 20 years of talks
item.description: The accord will see free trade on almost all goods between the 27 members of the EU and India, affecting nearly 2 billion people.

item.title: The Underrated Power of Curiosity
item.description: Curiosity fuels engagement, eases fear and strengthens connection in business and in life.

item.title: Hotels Are Cutting This Basic Feature to Save Money, and Guests Are Revolting
item.description: Privacy-loving travelers are furious about this trend, and are speaking out online.

item.title: Minnesota launched a website to correct misinformation coming from the Department of Homeland Security
item.description: Department of Corrections leaders said the site was intended to correct the public record after the death of Alex Pretti.

item.title: This new privacy-focused phone service is designed to keep your phone from getting hacked

item.title: Pinterest Quietly Reveals 14% Workforce Cut in SEC Filing as It Ramps Up AI Spending
item.description: The social media company joins a broader wave of layoffs amongst the AI boom. Some, however, aren’t convinced AI is the cause.

item.title: The Fed seeks a pivot to interest rates at upcoming meeting after DOJ subpoenas and political drama

item.title: Jerome Powell poised to displease Trump yet again with more inaction on rate cuts

item.title: Trump is threatening to hike tariffs on these South Korean goods. Here’s why
item.description: President Donald Trump said Monday he is increasing tariffs on South Korean goods because the country’s legislature has yet to approve the trade frame...

item.title: For successful AI adoption, managers should focus on a different movie to drive transformation
item.description: How managerial transformation will pave the way for AI enterprises, with humans leading the way.

item.title: Do You Accept Crypto at Check-Out? New Data Shows a Rising Number of Businesses Do
item.description: Polling by PayPal and the National Cryptocurrency Association suggests a rising tide of e-currency acceptance.

item.title: Yahoo claps back on AI search engines with Yahoo Scout

item.title: How Creativity Helped Shin Lim Stand Out—and Become a Las Vegas Headliner
item.description: The ‘America’s Got Talent’ winner shares wisdom for people trying to make a lasting impression.

item.title: Instagram, TikTok, YouTube finally face day in court over whether they peddle addictive products to kids
